description: On your cookies, roll the dice, go! Taste sweet victory when you collect matching cookies in this easy-to-learn “bingo game with a twist”. Place numbered tokens. Roll the dice and draw lines around the cookies with matching numbers. Claim cookies first to score the most points! In Cookie Party Game, everyone plays simultaneously: The dice and number chips determine where walls may be drawn on the game board. If a cookie is completely enclosed in the process, it can be ticked off. The goal is to outsmart your opponents and tick off all cookies of a certain type, as this will earn you many points. The first player to collect the required number of points wins the entertaining and engaging Roll & Write game. Thanks to the double-sided laminated game boards and erasable pens, the game can be played as often as desired and offers a lot of variety in two exciting versions.
